				KTZ_amphibious_tanks = 1
			}
		}
		## land_doctrine
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = superior_firepower
					has_tech = trench_warfare
					has_tech = mass_assault
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mobile_warfare
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							is_ai = yes
						}
						original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						cost_reduction = 1
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							popup = no
							mobile_warfare = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = delay
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							is_ai = yes
						}
						original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						cost_reduction = 1
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							popup = no
							delay = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {

						}

		## naval_doctrine

		### naval doctrine
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = trade_interdiction
					has_tech = base_strike
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = fleet_in_being
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							is_ai = yes
						}
						original_tag = BAL
					}
					add_doctrine_cost_reduction = {
						name = naval_doc_bonus
						cost_reduction = 1
						uses = 1
						category = naval_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							popup = no
							fleet_in_being = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {

							original_tag = BAL
							original_tag = GFF
							original_tag = JUN
						}
					}

						name = naval_doc_bonus
						cost_reduction = 1
						uses = 1
						category = naval_doctrine
					}
					else = {

							popup = no

						}
					}

						zebra_bounded_weapons = 1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = zebra_warriors_of_new_age
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						popup = no
						zebra_warriors_of_new_age = 1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_zebra_war_canoes
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					tech_zebra_war_canoes = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_zebra_war_canoes_sea
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					tech_zebra_war_canoes_sea = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_zebra_war_canoes_sea2
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					tech_zebra_war_canoes_sea2 = 1
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_3
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_3
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_air_radar_3
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_4
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_air_radar_4
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_air_radar_4
		}

		## rocket special projects
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_flying_bomb
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_air_to_air_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_anti_radiation_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_air_launched_cruise_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_ballistic_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_medium_range_ballistic_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_long_range_ballistic_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_ground_to_air_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rockets_anti_ballistic_missile
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rocket_interceptor
				}
				PREV = {
					is_special_project_completed = sp:sp_rocket_interceptor
				}
			}
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_rocket_interceptor
		}
		
		fix_weapon_techs = yes	
	}
}
